subject: Personal Finance
title: Narrative Economics
description: Learn Narrative Economics in one minute.

hook.text: Stories move markets more than spreadsheets. 'AI will change everything' drives billions in investment.

buildup.text: Economist Robert Shiller argued that viral narratives drive economic booms and busts.

twist.text: The stories aren't always wrong. The internet DID change everything. Just not at the valuations of 1999.

climax.text: Understanding which narratives are driving markets helps you separate signal from hype.

punchline.text: Markets run on stories as much as numbers.

quiz.question: What is narrative economics?
options: The idea that viral stories drive economic events
